Website Style Guide

Brand

Elements

Buttons

button--subtle 
<button  class="button button--subtle">Button</button>
<button  class="button button--subtle" type="submit">Submit Button</button>
<a href="#" class="button  button--subtle">Link button</a></button>
<input  class="button  button--subtle" type="button" value="Input button"></input>
<input  class="button  button--subtle" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--small 
<button class="button  button--small">Button</button>
<button type="submit" class="button  button--small">Submit Button</button>
<a href="#" class="button  button--small">Link button</a></button>
<input class="button  button--small" type="button" value="Input button"></input>
<input class="button  button--small" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--secondary 
<button class="button  button--secondary">Button</button>
<button class="button  button--secondary" type="submit" >Submit Button</button>
<a href="#" class="button  button--secondary">Link button</a></button>
<input  class="button  button--secondary" type="button" value="Input button"></input>
<input  class="button  button--secondary" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--primary 
<button class="button  button--primary">Button</button>
<button class="button  button--primary" type="submit">Submit Button</button>
<a href="#" class="button  button--primary">Link button</a></button>
<input class="button  button--primary" type="button" value="Input button"></input>
<input class="button  button--primary" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--large 
<button class="button  button--large">Button</button>
<button type="submit" class="button  button--large">Submit Button</button>
<a href="#" class="button  button--large">Link button</a></button>
<input type="button"  class="button  button--large" value="Input button"></input>
<input type="submit"  class="button  button--large" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
button--disabled 
<button class="button" disabled>Button</button>
<button type="submit" class="button"  disabled>Submit Button</button>
<a href="#" class="button  button--disabled">Link button</a>
<input class="button"  type="button" value="Input button" disabled></input>
<input class="button"  type="submit" value="Input submit button" disabled></input>
Link button

Forms

form-input.checkbox 
<ul class="form-fields">
	<li class="spoken-form">
		<label for="checkbox"  class="check">
			<input id="checkbox" type="checkbox"  class="checkbox"  required />Single Checkbox
		</label>
		<small class="additional">Note about this form field</small>
	</li>
</ul>
  • Note about this form field
form-textarea-disabled 
<form >
    <fieldset class="select field">
        <legend>Textarea Disabled <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></legend>
        <ul class="check-list">
            <li  class="block-field">
				<textarea class="text-input" rows="8" cols="32" required disabled></textarea>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </fieldset>
</form>
Textarea Disabled *
form-textarea 
<form >
    <fieldset class="select field">
        <legend>Textarea <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></legend>
        <ul class="check-list">
            <li  class="block-field">
				<textarea class="text-input" rows="8" cols="32" required></textarea>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </fieldset>
</form>
Textarea *
form-spoken-layout 
<ul class="form-fields">
    <li class="spoken-form">
        Hello, my <label for="spoken-name">name</label> is
        <input type="text" class="text-input" id="spoken-name">. My home
        <label for="country">country</label> is
        <select id="country">
            <option>UK</option>
            <option>US</option>
            <option>Other</option>
        </select>
    </li>
</ul>
  • Hello, my is . My home is
form-signup 
<form>
	<fieldset>
		<legend>Signup</legend>
	    <ul class="form-fields">
	        <li class="block-field">
				<label for="email">Your Email Address:</label>
	        	<input id="email" class="text-input" type="email" placeholder="Where place people send your electronic mail?" />
	        	<small class="additional">Note about this field</small>
	        </li>
	        <li class="block-field">
				<label for="name">Your Name:</label>
	        	<input id="name" class="text-input" type="text" placeholder="What do people call you?" />
	        </li>
	        <li class="block-field">
	        	<select class="form-control">
	        	  <option>1</option>
	        	  <option>2</option>
	        	  <option>3</option>
	        	  <option>4</option>
	        	  <option>5</option>
	        	</select>
	        </li>
	    </ul>
	</fieldset>
</form>
Signup
  • Note about this field

		<label for="select">Please select your option<abbr title="Required">*</abbr></label>

	        <optgroup label="Option Group A">

	            <option>Option Four</option>
	            <option>Option Five</option>
	            <option>Option Six</option>
	        </optgroup>
	    </select>
	</li>
</ul>

form-options-radios-captions 
<form >
    <fieldset>
        <legend>Radio Buttons with Captions <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></legend>
        <ul class="check-list">
            <li>
                <label for="radio1"><input id="radio1" name="radio" type="radio" checked/> Choice A</label>
                <small class="additional">Note about this option</small>
            </li>
            <li>
                <label for="radio2"><input id="radio2" name="radio" type="radio"/> Choice B</label>
                <small class="additional">Note about this option</small>
            </li>
            <li>
                <label for="radio3"><input id="radio3" name="radio" type="radio"/> Choice C</label>
                <small class="additional">Note about this option</small>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </fieldset>
</form>
Radio Buttons with Captions *
  • Note about this option
  • Note about this option
  • Note about this option

form-input.url 
<ul class="form-fields">
  <li>
    <label for="url">Email Address<abbr title="required">*</abbr></label>
    <input  class="text-input" id="url" type="url"  placeholder="http://yourwebsite.com"  required />
    <small class="additional">Note about this form field</small>
  </li>
</ul>
  • Note about this form field
form-input.text-help 
<ul class="form-fields">
  <li>
    <label for="text"  class="check">An input with some extra help<abbr title="required">*</abbr></label>
    <input class="text-input" id="text" type="text"  placeholder="Your text"  required />
    <small class="form-help">This is an extra hint</small>
  </li>
</ul>
  • This is an extra hint
form-input-text-disabled

    <small class="note">Note about this form field</small>
  </li>
</ul>

form-fieldset 
<form>
<fieldset>
<legend>Legend</legend>
<p><small class="additional">Required fields are marked <abbr title="Required">*</abbr></small></p>
</fieldset>
</form>
Legend

Required fields are marked *

Links

a-rel-external 
<p>A link going to an <a href="#" rel="external"> external site</a></p>

A link going to an external site

a 
<p>This is an <a href="#"> inline link</a></p>

This is an inline link

Lists

list-unordered-numbered 
<ul class="numbered-list">
  <li>Milk</li>
  <li>Eggs</li>
  <li>Yogurt</li>
</ul>
  • Milk
  • Eggs
  • Yogurt
list-unordered 
<ul>
  <li>Apple </li>
  <li>Microsoft</li>
  <li>Linux</li>
</ul>
  • Apple
  • Microsoft
  • Linux
lists-ordered 
<ol>
  <li>Add listed ingredients to large mixing bowl</li>
  <li>Stir for two minutes or until no longer lumpy</li>
  <li>Pour mixture into a baking pan</li>
</ol>
  1. Add listed ingredients to large mixing bowl
  2. Stir for two minutes or until no longer lumpy
  3. Pour mixture into a baking pan

Tables

table 
<table>
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th colspan="2">Program</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th>Main Session</th>
			<td>$1,200</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>Breakouts</th>
			<td>$300</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>Workshops</th>
			<td>$800</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>Party</th>
			<td>$200</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<table>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th>Total Conference Costs</th>
			<td>$2500</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>Hotel</th>
			<td>$1000</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>Travel</th>
			<td>$600</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
	<tfoot>
		<tr>
			<th>Total Expenses</th>
			<td>4100</td>
		</tr>
	</tfoot>
</table>
Program
Main Session $1,200
Breakouts $300
Workshops $800
Party $200
Total Conference Costs $2500
Hotel $1000
Travel $600
Total Expenses 4100

time 
<time datetime="2014-03-05 02:02">March 5th, 2014</time>
March 5th, 2014

<p>Our global headquarters is in Orlando. <strong>Beware of aligators</strong>.</p>

Our global headquarters is in Orlando. Beware of aligators.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.</p>

	    </blockquote>

dl-dfn

    <dt><dfn>Lorem Ipsum</dfn>,</dt>
    <dd>A filler text commonly used in print and web design</dd>

    <dd>The World-Wide Web (WWW) is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed onthe Internet. </dd>
</dl>
Lorem Ipsum,
A filler text commonly used in print and web design
WWW
The World-Wide Web (WWW) is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed onthe Internet.
dfn 
<p><dfn>Lorem ipsum</dfn> is filler text</p>

Lorem ipsum is filler text

details 
<details>
	<summary>What is Cru?</summary>
	<p>Cru is a caring community passionate about connecting people to Jesus Christ</p>

</details>
What is Cru?

Cru is a caring community passionate about connecting people to Jesus Christ

del 
<p>We are known in the US as <del>Campus Crusade for Christ</del> Cru</p>

cite 
<p><cite>New York Times</cite>, August 1, 2013</p>

New York Times, August 1, 2013

bold 
<p>Make sure there is nothing in the over <b>before</b> heating it up. </p>

Make sure there is nothing in the over before heating it up.

blockquote 
<div class="article-wrap">
	<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</p>
	<blockquote><p>Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.</p></blockquote>
	<p>Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.</p>	
</div>

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

address 
<p>For details, contact <a href="//twitter.com/tdaffron">Terry Daffron</a>.</p>

For details, contact Terry Daffron.

abbr 
<p><abbr title="New York City">NYC</abbr> is the city that never sleeps.</p>

NYC is the city that never sleeps.
